title: Willing to sponsor willing GDers :D

embed.description: Hey guys and girls! Why not grab you and 4 mates and enter the Oceanic LOL Cup! Entry is the $25 per team and you could win $500 RP! Here's what you need to know :D. Details - The Oceanic LoL Cup is a competition being hosted by Oceanic LoL on Facebook.

body:
Why none of may be the internationally worth LOL-players, that's no reason to not compete locally!
I'm really keen for this tourny, and think we could all have a lot of fun with regular organised games for teams to practice and grow! 

If anyone from Boards/GD is interesting in making teams and competeing, I thought I'd sponsor a couple teams :).
I was thinking of creating team "For the Forums"  and "Down with Boards".
Let me know here or else where if your keen, and who your keen to play with :D.

replies.body: Yeah I'd be up for it :3

Great!
Which team would you like to be on, and would you like to be a Captain?
I'd join but all my friends are bronze trash.

Well either carry them, or seek non bronze trash GDers.
There are enough.
